msg: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

msg: We become what we think about
author: Earl Nightingale

msg: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
author: Booker T. Washington

msg: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me.
author: Erma Bombeck

msg: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

msg: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

msg: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.
author: Teddy Roosevelt
